title: Unboxing: Apple iPad Pro 9.7-Inch Tablet
description:
Apple iPad Pro 9.7-Inch 32GB Wi-Fi Gold - MLMQ2LL/A
http://www.abt.com/product/99557/Apple-MLMQ2LLA.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=MLMQ2LLA_20160331

The 9.7-inch iPad Pro brings the breakthrough features of the 12.9-inch iPad Pro to the most popular iPad size. Powered by the A9X chip and featuring the brightest most advanced Retina display it also has immersive four speaker audio 12MP iSight and 5MP FaceTime HD cameras Touch ID and ultrafast wireless connectivity. Combined with Apple Pencil and the Smart Keyboard iPad Pro becomes even more capable portable and versatile.
Features:
• Our most advanced display
o 9.7-inch Retina display has 2048- by-1536 resolution with 3.1 million pixels and delivers our best display technology in a thin and light design
o Delivers 25 greater color saturation 40 less reflectivity and is 25 brighter than iPad Air 2—so everything always looks amazing
o New True Tone display adjusts intensity and color temperature to the ambient lighting for a more comfortable viewing experience
• Powerful and power-efficient A9X chip
o Most advanced chip in any iOS device delivering performance rivaling personal computers
o With up to 1.7 times the CPU and graphics performance of the A8X chip in iPad Air 2 the A9X chip delivers incredible responsiveness in apps and games and still delivers 10-hour battery life
• New iSight and FaceTime HD cameras
o 12MP iSight Camera with True Tone flash captures stunning 4K video Live Photos and up to 63MP Panoramas
o 5MP FaceTime HD camera with Retina Flash lets you capture gorgeous selfies and clear video calls
• Immersive four speaker audio
o Enjoy wider frequency range and up to two times more sound output than iPad Air 2—no matter which way you hold it for music and movie watching
• Incredibly thin and light design
o Just 6.1 mm thin and weighs less than one pound so you can take it wherever you go
• Apple Pencil
o Apple Pencil on iPad Pro goes beyond Multi-Touch to deliver even greater precision for tasks such as writing drawing or annotating
• Smart Keyboard
o An elegant keyboard designed specifically for the 9.7-inch iPad Pro and a slim lightweight cover all in one design
• Ultrafast wireless
o Wi-Fi (802.11a/b/g/n/ac); dual channel (2.4GHz and 5GHz); HT80 with MIMO
o Bluetooth 4.2 technology
• Touch ID
o A fast easy and secure way to unlock your iPad and log into apps using your fingerprint
o Approve purchases from iTunes App Store and iBooks Store and use Apple Pay within apps
• iOS 9
o Be more productive with multitasking features like Slide Over Split View and Picture in Picture
o QuickType makes formatting and text selection even easier and it puts shortcuts right at your fingertips
o Night Shift reduces blue light emitting from the display at night so iPad is easier on your eyes
• Apps books movies and more
o Over 1 million apps designed specifically for iPad—for productivity creativity gaming travel photos and more
